languages.text: Был дан кровавый обет, и пали цепи с тени Домин. Но осталась она тиха и недвижна, ибо не знала смысла покидать чертог Смерти. И сказал{mf||а} ей тогда Домин, что...
An oath of blood was sworn, and the chains fell from the Domin's shadow. Yet she remained silent and motionless, for she saw no sense in leaving the halls of Death. To which the Domin told her...

languages.text: Ein Bluteid wurde geschworen, und die Ketten fielen vom Schatten {mf|des|der} Domin. Doch sie blieb stumm und reglos, denn sie sah keinen Sinn darin, die Hallen des Todes zu verlassen. Und {mf|der|die} Domin sagte ihr ...
languages.original_text: An oath of blood was sworn, and the chains fell from the Domin's shadow. Yet she remained silent and motionless, for she saw no sense in leaving the halls of Death. To which the Domin told her...

languages.text: Se prestó un juramento de sangre y las cadenas cayeron de la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin. Sin embargo, guardó silencio y no se movió, pues no veía razón para dejar los salones de la Muerte. A lo que {mf|el|la} Domin le dijo...
languages.original_text: An oath of blood was sworn, and the chains fell from the Domin's shadow. Yet she remained silent and motionless, for she saw no sense in leaving the halls of Death. To which the Domin told her...

traits.locale_text: Se prestó un juramento de sangre y las cadenas cayeron de la sombra de{mf|l| la} Domin. Sin embargo, guardó silencio y no se movió, pues no veía razón para dejar los salones de la Muerte. A lo que {mf|el|la} Domin le dijo...

languages.text: 血の誓いが交わされ、ドミンの影から鎖が落ちる。それでも彼女は黙ったまま動かずにいた。死の広間を離れることに何の意味も見いだせなかったからだ。そのことについて、ドミンは伝えた…
languages.original_text: An oath of blood was sworn, and the chains fell from the Domin's shadow. Yet she remained silent and motionless, for she saw no sense in leaving the halls of Death. To which the Domin told her...

traits.locale_text: 血の誓いが交わされ、エニムの影から鎖が落ちる。それでも彼女は黙ったまま動かずにいた。死の広間を離れることに何の意味も見いだせなかったからだ。そのことについて、エニムは伝えた…

languages.text: 于是，秘者许下了鲜血的誓言，秘者影子身上的铁链落在了地上。然而，她依然保持沉默，一动不动，因为她认为离开死亡的殿堂是毫无意义的举动，而秘者告诉她……
languages.original_text: An oath of blood was sworn, and the chains fell from the Domin's shadow. Yet she remained silent and motionless, for she saw no sense in leaving the halls of Death. To which the Domin told her...

traits.locale_text: 于是，秘者许下了鲜血的誓言，秘者影子身上的铁链落在了地上。然而，她依然保持沉默，一动不动，因为她认为离开死亡的殿堂是毫无意义的举动，而秘者告诉她……

languages.text: Un serment de sang fut prononcé et l'ombre {mf|du|de la} Domin fut débarrassée de ses chaînes. Pourtant, elle demeura silencieuse et immobile, car quitter les couloirs de la Mort n'avait pour elle aucun sens. {mf|Le|La} Domin lui dit alors...
languages.original_text: An oath of blood was sworn, and the chains fell from the Domin's shadow. Yet she remained silent and motionless, for she saw no sense in leaving the halls of Death. To which the Domin told her...

languages.text: Bir kan yemini edildi ve Domin'in gölgesini saran zincirler düştü. Lakin gölge, sükûnetini ve hareketsizliğini korudu. Çünkü Ölüm'ün salonlarından ayrılmanın manasını görememişti. Domin, bu hususa dair ona...
languages.original_text: An oath of blood was sworn, and the chains fell from the Domin's shadow. Yet she remained silent and motionless, for she saw no sense in leaving the halls of Death. To which the Domin told her...
